author: mcconnell
msg: Created an api/impl/instrumented split of the pool package.  Dropped depricated content (logkit refs and Loggable).  Removed dependencies from excalibur testcase (copied a couple of utility class to the local  impl test directory).  Setup maven builds and validated build sequence. Changed version on api, impl, and instrumentable packages to SNAPSHOT (target release version would be 2.0).
